snippet: Lt. Gov. Mark Darr said Tuesday that he would not resign over ethics violations tied to his campaign and office spending.
abstract: Arkansas Lt Gov Mark Darr says he will not resign over ethics violations tied to his campaign and office spending, despite growing calls for him to quit or face threat of impeachment.
lead_paragraph: Lt. Gov. Mark Darr said Tuesday that he would not resign over ethics violations tied to his campaign and office spending.

headline.main: Arkansas: Lieutenant Governor Resists Calls to Quit
headline.print_headline: Arkansas: Lieutenant Governor Resists Calls To Quit
